word_mean: 驱风的，排气的：减轻胃肠气胀的

sentence.Network_en: Digestive: stimulates the production of gastric juices ( carminative ), improves appetite and digestion.
sentence.Network_cn: 消化: 刺激产生胃液 ( 排出胃肠气体 ), 改善食欲和消化力.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French carminatif, -ive, or medieval Latin carminat- 'healed (by incantation'), from the verb carminare, from Latin carmen (see charm)

means.word_mean: 1. medication that prevents the formation of gas in the alimentary tract or eases its passing
1. relieving gas in the alimentary tract (colic or flatulence or griping)
